column1: This is fantastic news!  President Trump's #OperationWarpSpeed is working!  It’s American innovation that will help defeat #COVID19🇺🇸 https://t.co/eGNl5q46s4
I am praying for a speedy recovery by the President and First Lady from COVID-19.  Our nation is behind you and we will get through this. https://t.co/FfBKMYa2tf
Please join me in praying for my friend @RepMikeCarter as he fights COVID-19.  Mike was admitted to the ICU yesterday. https://t.co/j5ryccHzph

If you have recovered from Coronavirus you can donate your plasma to help save lives.  Check out https://t.co/t9ximCHtjw to learn more.  Watch my friend @RepBradWenstrup explain more ⬇ https://t.co/f0dlfe3Glh

Today I held a virtual meeting with the United Way of Tennessee to discuss legislative priorities as we continue to navigate the COVID-19 pandemic as a community and as a nation. https://t.co/3thTGCmswQ

Great discussion with the Oak Ridge Chamber of Commerce. We discussed the economy what the federal government is doing to assist localities in response to COVID-19 and securing assistance for small businesses. https://t.co/2Redm5tteJ

I just got off the phone w/ @SecretService Director James M. Murray.  I spoke w/ him about the work they're doing to combat unemployment fraud & to keep criminals from distributing fraudulent COVID-19 tests.  Great work being done by the men & women in the U.S. Secret Service.

Just informed by @HHSGov that Tennessee will receive $93230000 in relief funds for skilled nursing facilities to help them combat COVID-19.  This is welcome news for the most vulnerable in our state. I will continue to work to secure funding to combat this devastating pandemic.

Great news! @myTDOT is receiving an award of $32816676 from the @FTA_DOT through the CARES Act.   The grant funds will pay for operating administrative and preventive maintenance costs for rural transit agencies in order to respond to and recover from COVID-19.

I joined @RepDebDingell @RepFredUpton & a bipartisan group of our House colleagues in leading a letter urging House Leadership to support jobs and economic stabilization of the auto industry in future coronavirus relief packages.  Read more here ⬇️ https://t.co/UwB85TbtTl https://t.co/bKnx4giTEi

Good news! Chattanooga Area Regional Transportation Authority is being awarded $11936761 in @FTA_DOT funds through the CARES Act.  The grant will pay for operating administrative and preventive maintenance costs in order to respond to and recover from COVID-19.
Great work by these @UTChattanooga students who are helping to monitor the spread of COVID-19.  This work is critical for safety as our state and nation begins to reopen.  https://t.co/JIMz6uMS19
ICYMI — I held a Facebook Live Townhall last night to take your questions regarding the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.   Afterwards I spoke with @newschannelnine ⬇️ https://t.co/EwYvYx18Ud
Thank you @SecretaryCarson!   This is great news for Tennessee. Over $46 million in Coronavirus Relief Funds have been allocated to state and local governments! https://t.co/88JLnYagiH

The U.S. must lead in holding China accountable.  The Chinese Communist Party lied & tried to cover up their failure to contain COVID-19.  Their failure has now cost thousands of American lives & millions of American jobs.  Via @jeff_poor @BreitbartNews https://t.co/Zhyd9CVyXI

Thank you @POTUS for highlighting @ORNL’s work in the fight against COVID-19!  ORNL is using advanced manufacturing to produce metal molds in days that would normally take months  Industry partners will be able to use these molds to mass produce test tubes for COVID-19 test kits https://t.co/31gVQ9KGRj

Good work by @DHSgov.  Criminals who are preying on America’s most vulnerable to make money MUST be found and brought to justice immediately.  To report suspected criminal activity related to the COVID-19 pandemic email —> Covid19Fraud@dhs.gov  https://t.co/zHUBwm9f8z

Great work by researchers at @ORNL who are joining the fight against COVID-19 by applying their expertise in computational science advanced manufacturing data science and neutron science.  Read more ⬇️ https://t.co/sLrsgdHYxq

#Smallbiz in my district are not only struggling w/ the effects of COVID-19 but also a deadly tornado.  The American people have had enough of these partisan games by Senate & House Democrats.  We NEED a clean funding bill for the Paycheck Protection Program & we need it NOW. https://t.co/qb6IuSwF0q
.@TNDeptofHealth will offer 33 drive-through COVID-19 testing events this weekend.  Find one near you ⬇️ https://t.co/yAnkwFIqdR
Great op-Ed by @MarshaBlackburn.  She hits the nail on the head here.   “In the time of coronavirus Tennessee innovators pave the way for supply chain security.” https://t.co/Pu66g2U43g
Great news! @FAANews  has awarded Lovell Field $5747955 and Cleveland Regional Jetport $69000 for economic relief due to COVID19.    https://t.co/xIBBkK0MdX

If you did NOT file a tax return in 2018 or 2019 please check this link from @IRSnews to see how you can receive your Economic Impact Payment (also called the COVID-19 stimulus check).  Get more information here ⬇️ https://t.co/ExlyF2IYtN
NEW: @HHSGov is sending Tennessee’s hospitals and healthcare providers $739.7 million for COVID-19 response efforts.   Thank you! https://t.co/0ZZmYTJvz2
Be responsible choose a home that is following @CDCgov guidelines to reduce the spread of COVID-19. https://t.co/OFyrjI48aJ

On a Tennessee Chamber of Commerce Zoom townhall today with @DrPhilRoe @RepTimBurchett @DesJarlaisTN04 to talk with East Tennessee Small Businesses about how they are being affected by COVID-19. https://t.co/GtgyByWDkg
Speaking with the Tennessee Trucking Association and their members who have done a great job of keeping our supply lines open during the COVID-19 pandemic. https://t.co/7J0Xo26p3z
Great work from a fantastic local business to not only support our community but keep our community safe and healthy as we combat COVID-19. https://t.co/OeMVZlkqWM
Thankfully @POTUS has made it a priority to work to quickly secure our medical supply chains as we continue to combat COVID-19.  My statement ⬇️ https://t.co/kiIjsyH6e6 https://t.co/k6WbLV1mPd
Brenda and I are praying for Prime Minister @BorisJohnson as he continues to battle COVID-19.

We have NOT reached the peak of COVID-19 yet.  It is important you continue to👇  🏠Stay home. 🍽Support small biz by ordering delivery or pickup when you can. 🧼Wash your hands. 📏Stay 6 feet apart. ☎️Check in on loved ones.  More info from @CDCgov ⬇️ https://t.co/RiiGWGxg2T https://t.co/ixUQYca29M

.@POTUS has approved a major disaster declaration for Tennessee. This will give the state &  communities new sources of funding as we work to combat COVID-19. Proud to have stood w/ the entire delegation in urging a quick approval.   Thank you President Trump!
Great work by @FEMA to secure critical supplies and equipment for our nation as we combat COVID-19. https://t.co/v3JbpjciBa

Had a productive call with @FEMA today on what they’re doing to combat the spread of COVID-19.    Have questions? Hearing rumors? Check out FEMA’s rumor control website ⬇️ https://t.co/Zby3bspmQh https://t.co/nabejZXGFA
30 days to slow the spread of COVID-19.   It’s on all of us to do our part to keep our country safe.   For more information visit @CDCgov ⬇️ https://t.co/RiiGWGxg2T https://t.co/6KgIr4qMBJ
HAPPENING NOW: I'm holding a telephone town hall to answer your questions on COVID-19.   📞To ask a question call:   855-543-3352  📺Watch live here:  https://t.co/alfQCjMdJt https://t.co/oFN52wgPqY

TONIGHT at 5:30pm EDT I'll be holding a telephone town hall to answer your questions on COVID-19.   📞To ask a question call:   855-543-3352  📺Watch live here:  https://t.co/alfQCjMdJt   Can't join the call but have a question? Submit one here:   https://t.co/rlZV4XrDE1 https://t.co/aThuhJT5FG

Congress has once again come together in a bipartisan fashion to pass a third funding package in support of the American people as we work to combat COVID-19.  The CARES Act will provide tangible and real relief for many American families and businesses.  https://t.co/Oq002ZKV8d https://t.co/43jSDS0cAB

Today I joined the East Tennessee Economic Council's first virtual Friday morning meeting to discuss COVID-19 and what I’m doing in Congress to support our communities as we combat this virus. https://t.co/pMDxLt0jp2

Last week I urged the @US_FDA to approve a waiver so that the @BaylorSchool could begin COVID-19 testing.   Today their researchers will begin testing.   Their work will be crucial in keeping East Tennessee safe. https://t.co/mgOjwCcFjr

FACT: My district is home to the world’s fastest super computer.   “Summit” which is housed at @ORNL is being used to look for compounds already on the market that might foil COVID-19.   Great work being done by the researchers at Oak Ridge. https://t.co/4qZU6rWAfY

I am proud to have advocated for the @baylorschool as they sought to become a local testing site for COVID-19. The important work being done by Baylor School researchers will be crucial in keeping the people of East Tennessee safe.  My statement ⬇️ https://t.co/MjgUjMlD19 https://t.co/buWXupoEkx

America is strong because of the small businesses and entrepreneurs who built this great nation.   The American worker is strong and resilient.   I will continue to do all I can to support American workers as combat the spread of COVID-19. https://t.co/nqCwWuYYkD
On the air with WYSH in Anderson County discussing federal efforts to meet the challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic.   📻Listen here —> https://t.co/5tFZocaT8k https://t.co/Mqg2KaE3er

Today I joined the entire Tennessee delegation on a call with @GovBillLee to discuss Tennessee’s response to COVID-19 and the tools being provided by the federal government to help combat the spread of this virus. https://t.co/oZYkDfp0YB
It is our duty to support the American worker as we work to combat COVID-19.   The latest funding package included support and flexibility for small businesses. https://t.co/qpJ05p1AHn

Late last Friday night I voted in support of a major package that ensures that COVID-19 testing will be free for every American.   This a great step forward in combating this crisis. https://t.co/EXouVgLjFV
15 days to slow the spread of COVID-19.   See how you can help ⬇️ https://t.co/xntH9bVKPR
Great news for Tennessee! @CDCgov has just announced that they will be awarding $10 million for Tennessee COVID-19 response efforts.
Good time to remember to not trust what a friend of a friend posted on social media.  Get the facts and the most up to date information on COVID-19 from @CDCgov ⬇️  https://t.co/RiiGWGxg2T

Reducing the spread of coronavirus:   🧼Wash your hands for 20 seconds (The length of singing “Happy Birthday” twice).  🏠Practice social distancing.  ✋Avoid touching your face.  Check out @CDCgov for more tips & info ⬇️ https://t.co/RiiGWGxg2T
Great work by members of our community.   We are all united in this effort to combat COVID-19 and protect our most vulnerable. https://t.co/prJeNWdVZ5

I am glad that Congress has come together in a bipartisan manner to protect American families as we continue to work to curb the spread of COVID-19.  This legislation provides critical additional funding to assist our nation’s most vulnerable.  Statement⬇️ https://t.co/QpUSAoGtS5 https://t.co/DMYBpxZQPf

Keep yourself your friends your family and your coworkers safe by following these steps.   For further information on prevention of COVID-19 check out @CDCgov ⬇️ https://t.co/RiiGWGxg2T https://t.co/8eFGfVyjG3
COVID-19 has exposed an Achilles heel for the United States.     We must make American manufacturing and innovation of pharmaceuticals and medical supplies a priority. https://t.co/z4Xp3ay4cI

We are united in our efforts to combat and contain coronavirus.   I thank the House and Senate for working to quickly pass the emergency supplemental and I thank President Donald Trump for getting it signed. https://t.co/8gdPwYUcXo

Coronavirus does not discriminate based on party lines and it is imperative that Congress act in a bipartisan manner to protect all Americans and combat the spread of this virus.  I commend @POTUS for acting quickly to protect Americans.  My statement ⬇️ https://t.co/UTh6kZZMwV https://t.co/482YFtleXi

We’re all keeping a watchful eye on the ongoing Coronavirus situation.   Today I talked to @DHSgov Acting Secretary @DHS_Wolf about what the Department of Homeland Security is doing to prepare and keep our nation safe. https://t.co/G6qGOyPhJn
